price: او كوم خلك چې زموږ آيتونه دروغ وګڼي هغوى ته به د خپلو سرغړونو له امله عذاب ورسېږي.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā yamassuhumu al-ʿadhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūna
